description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Merging classic platforming with psychedelic visuals and a pumping sound track Growing Pains will blow your mind as 'the vessel' continually grows while you play.  Featuring 9 levels with 3 difficulty levels that completely change how you play and the ability to share high scores and replays with your friends and the rest of the world Growing Pains is an experience not to be missed.
